EngineRule.ruleSpecification: <AttributeValues objType="ext.lps.power.CUSTOMManufacturer"> <!-- set the lifecycle --> <AttrValue id="lifeCycle.id" algorithm="com.ptc.core.foundation.lifecycle.server.impl.LifeCycleTemplateAttributeAlgorithm"> <Arg>CUSTOM Manufacturer Life Cycle</Arg> </AttrValue> <!-- specify AttrConstraint tag --> <AttrConstraint id="lifeCycle.id" algorithm="com.ptc.core.rule.server.impl.GatherAttributeConstraints"> <Value algorithm="com.ptc.core.rule.server.impl.GetServerAssignedConstraint"/> <Value algorithm="com.ptc.core.rule.server.impl.GetImmutableConstraint"/> </AttrConstraint> <AttrConstraint id="lifeCycle" algorithm="com.ptc.core.rule.server.impl.GatherAttributeConstraints"> <Value algorithm="com.ptc.core.rule.server.impl.GetServerAssignedConstraint"/> <Value algorithm="com.ptc.core.rule.server.impl.GetImmutableConstraint"/> </AttrConstraint> </AttributeValues>
